channel.title: CVE Feed for EFS Software -- Easy Chat Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for EFS Software -- Easy Chat Server

item.title: CVE-2023-4496|2024-08-02T07:31:05.530Z -- efs%20software -- easy%20chat%20server
item.description: Easy Chat Server, in its 3.1 version and before, does not sufficiently encrypt user-controlled inputs, resulting in a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability stored via /body2.ghp (POST method), in the mtowho parameter.

item.title: CVE-2023-4495|2024-08-02T07:31:06.193Z -- efs%20software -- easy%20chat%20server
item.description: Easy Chat Server, in its 3.1 version and before, does not sufficiently encrypt user-controlled inputs, resulting in a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability stored via /registresult.htm (POST method), in the Resume parameter. The XSS is loaded from /register.ghp.

item.title: CVE-2023-4494|2024-08-02T07:31:05.896Z -- efs%20software -- easy%20chat%20server
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Easy Chat Server 3.1 version. An attacker could send an excessively long username string to the register.ghp file asking for the name via a GET request resulting in arbitrary code execution on the remote machine.

item.title: CVE-2023-4497|2024-08-02T07:31:06.124Z -- efs%20software -- easy%20chat%20server
item.description: Easy Chat Server, in its 3.1 version and before, does not sufficiently encrypt user-controlled inputs, resulting in a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability stored via /registresult.htm (POST method), in the Icon parameter. The XSS is loaded from /users.ghp.
